hometown.description: I currently live in San Francisco, near Dolores Heights.

backdrops.description: I've been around the world, but I'm always happy to call San Francisco my home.

suggestions: What kind of work do you do?

school.description: I studied at UC San Diego (UCSD) in La Jolla, CA.

backdrops.description: I spent many hours studying in the Geisel Library at UCSD with amazing views looking onto the campus in La Jolla.
Nothing like a surf break in Cardiff to take the mind off of studying :)

suggestions: What have you done with your degree?

hobbies.description: Gardening, cooking, and music are my main hobbies outside of work.

backdrops.description: The yard I designed and maintained at a former residence in Berkeley, CA.

experience.description: I have a wide range of work experience.
suggestions: How has your experience shaped your perspective on tech for AEC?
How are you applying AI to the work you're doing?

degree.description: I studied Mathematics and Computer Science.

backdrops.description: I've used my background in math/cs to explore the concept of drawing with sound. The idea here was to manipulate droplets based on audio input. It uses a 'Fast Fourier Transform' to map audio frequencies onto visual properties like motion, vibration, and expansion.

suggestions: What projects have you worked on?
How did you learn about AI?

outer-labs.description: I was CEO and co-founder of Outer Labs from 2018 to 2024.

backdrops.description: When I was founding Outer Labs, I used colors and shapes to define our brand identity.

suggestions: What did you learn from Outer Labs?
What are you working on now?
